0.title: Body Typography
0.selector: body, .els-blog-cat-author li label, .els-sidebar .els-recent-blog-widget label, .woocommerce-Tabs-panel .shop_attributes th, .woocommerce-Tabs-panel .shop_attributes td, .els-product-summary-col .variations select, .woocommerce #review_form #respond input, .woocommerce #review_form #respond select, .woocommerce #review_form #respond textarea

4.title: Primary Regular Typography

5.title: Primary Medium Typography

6.title: Primary Bold Typography

7.title: Secondary Light Typography
